name: Shapocalypes Prequel
description:
Shapocalypse Prequel Is a 3rd person shooter. Help liberate the world from the shape parasites, taking over their heads. Shoot the heads off with a gun that shoots  shape seeds to free the survivors and escort them to evacuate the affected area. Only their own shape is the shape's weakness.

Programmed by Joshua Legaspi -> https://www.instagram.com/jiyoshu/

Art direction was created by Kelly Bull ->http://kellysketches.com/
